slides.heading: What is This?
slides.text: This is a powerful HTML/CSS-based presentation system that lets you create beautiful slides using simple JSON configuration.

slides.heading: Key Features
bullets: Multiple layout types (title, content, two-column, image)
Overview mode to see all slides

slides.heading: Keyboard Shortcuts
numbered: Use Arrow keys (← →) to navigate between slides
Press 'O' to toggle overview mode and see all slides
Press 'F' to enter fullscreen presentation mode
Press 'Home' or 'End' to jump to first or last slide
Press 'Esc' to exit fullscreen or overview mode
Press '?' to see help with all shortcuts

slides.heading: You Can Add Images
slides.caption: Images make your presentation more engaging

slides.heading: Mixed Content Example
slides.text: You can combine different content types in a single slide:
bullets: Use bullet points for key ideas

slides.heading: How to Edit
bullets: Open slides.json in any text editor
Add, remove, or modify slide objects
No compilation or build process needed

slides.heading: Available Layouts
slides.leftContent:
title - For cover slides with heading and subheading.

content - Standard slide with heading, text, bullets, or images.

two-column - Split content into two columns.

image - Focus on a large image with caption.
slides.rightContent: Just specify the layout type in your slide object, add the required fields, and you're done! Each layout is optimized for its specific purpose.

slides.text: Press 'O' or click the grid icon to see all slides at once. This lets you:
